title: Bug 9654: Modify Parameters - Dialog details
description: Bug 9654Modify Parameters: Dialog details duplicated name validation could be performed on the first page. The first and second column could be merged.
OB: The preview is cut off when changing a parameter name to something very long.
EB: The preview should display the complete parameter name even if it is very long.
SR: To reproduce: 1. Open the Modify Parameters dialog. 2. Change a parameter name to something very long. 3. Observe that the preview in the dialog is cut off.
